name: DataSchema - Modern database data administration tool
tagline: Modern database data administration tool. Cross-platform SQL GUI with data grid, interactive automatic charts reports with Slack integration
body:
### Dynamic datagrid
We scan your database and create metadata based dynamic data tables for you

### Wide-range supported databases list
We support all modern databases including PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle

### Automatic reports and Slack integration
SQL-based reports for your team or site administrators.
You can easily send your reports to Slack or just open them on site

### Authors and Contributors
Inspired by [Kazan Federal University](http://kpfu.ru)
